goal.ch: "The objective of this course is to provide a systematic and comprehensive insight which aids with the understanding practical use and progress of low power nano-scale CMOS commodity and embedded memory circuits, architectures, memory system and applications. The course starts with an overview of microprocessor memory architectures. We will discuss all design aspects and challenge issues for commodity and embedded SRAM, DRAM, NAND Flash and SSD memory subsystems.  Finally, low power memory systems design techniques will be presented."

outline.ch:
"1   Memory  and Storage Systems – Introduction
2   Memory Hierarchy - Multi-level Cache Organization
3   Memory Technology – Fundamentals
4   Embedded Cache (SRAM) Design Issues
5   Off-Chip Memory Interfaces
6   DRAM System Signaling and Timing
7   DRAM Memory Organization  and Access Protocol
8   DRAM Memory Controllers
9   Fully Buffered DIMM Memory Systems
10   High Bandwidth 3D Memory and Hybrid Memory Cube (HMC)
11   Flash Memory Controller and NOR and 3D NAND memory
12   Storage Class Memories (STT-RAM, PCRAM, ReRAM, 3D ReRAM)
13   Memory Hierarchy for AI / Machine Learning
14   Cloud Computing and Edge Computing
15   Big Data Storage and Processor-In-Memory (PIM) Computing"
